mapper.sql: id, address, point_name, brand_id, brand_name, alias, info, open_info, longitude, latitude, city_id, district_id, biz_area_id, barea_id, barea_ids, landmark, subway_ids, phone, type_id, source, creator_id, create_time, modify_time, merge_id, accurate_result, close_status, operate_status, sync_status, poi_type, trimed_longitude, trimed_latitude, area, customer_num, parking_info, wifi, style_ids, location_id, price_person, city_location_id, open_date
mapper.insert: insert into stage_poi(id, address, point_name, brand_id, brand_name, alias, info, open_info, longitude, latitude, city_id, district_id, biz_area_id, barea_id, barea_ids, landmark, subway_ids, phone, type_id, source, creator_id, create_time, modify_time, merge_id, accurate_result, close_status, operate_status, sync_status, poi_type, trimed_longitude, trimed_latitude, area, customer_num, parking_info, wifi, style_ids, location_id, price_person, city_location_id, open_date) values (#{id}, #{address}, #{pointName}, #{brandId}, #{brandName}, #{alias}, #{info}, #{openInfo}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{cityId}, #{districtId}, #{bizAreaId}, #{bareaId}, #{bareaIds}, #{landmark}, #{subwayIds}, #{phone}, #{typeId}, #{source}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{mergeId}, #{accurateResult}, #{closeStatus}, #{operateStatus}, #{syncStatus}, #{poiType}, #{trimedLongitude}, #{trimedLatitude}, #{area}, #{customerNum}, #{parkingInfo}, #{wifi}, #{styleIds}, #{locationId}, #{pricePerson}, #{cityLocationId}, #{openDate} )
